document.full_text: indonesia on friday slapped lengthy bans on citibank's  credit card and wealth management businesses over a case of alleged embezzlement and the death of a client following questioning by debt collectors.
document.title: indonesia lashes citi over embezzlement, debtor death
lines_and_colors: indonesia on friday slapped lengthy bans on citibank's  credit card and wealth management businesses over a case of alleged embezzlement and the death of a client following questioning by debt collectors.
